text: Glen Irwin (born March 1, 1951) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey player. He played in 233 WHA games with the Houston Aeros and Indianapolis Racers over five seasons. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Estevan Bruins players Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Glen Irwin
